title: What are “differences” and “similarities” and how do you define them? - Quora

response.answer_text: A measure of sanity is the ability to discern the differences and similarities of something. The more that things look the same to you, the worse off you are. You should be able to look at two (or more) things and be able to spot what they have in common and where they differ. You would be flabbergasted to find how many people can not do that.
